nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: A classmate who used to be friendly has started excluding you from a group project.

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: I did my part during practice, but now they split tasks without me.

choices.text: Talk to them calmly and ask why.
Accept it and find someone else to work with.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: They apologize; it turns out a misunderstanding caused the split. You clear the air.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
